name: Starship Explorer - Space Trip
description:
Dreaming of space becoming reality. You're on space base surrounded with control panel, technical devices, suspended in gravity-free-state, and outside your spaceship is an outer space and far-far away planet Earth. What can be better? Only the ability to discover everything in details and you can do it with Starship Explorer!

COMPLETE MISSIONS
You're able to finish tasks, not only to feel as a real astronaut! All missions are limited with time or endurance.

ONE GREAT TASK
All your missions are structured, you complete them to make one final task - get and turn space satellite round from shuttle.

VARIETY OF LOCATIONS
Space base itself, outer space and space shuttle are open for researches and explorations.

DON'T FORGET TO COLLECT POINTS
For bonus points you can improve your character and increase his endurance. And trust us - you'll need A LOT of it!

Starship Explorer - space is not a dream!
